meanings.definition: Make (a problem, bad situation, or negative feeling) worse.
meanings.sent3: Laughing during a serious talk exacerbates the tension.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the issue exacerbates the underlying problem.
meanings.sent5: Adding fuel to the fire exacerbates the conflict.

meanings.definition: Aggravate or intensify (a situation or condition).
meanings.sent1: His loud music exacerbates my headache.
meanings.sent2: The storm exacerbates the flooding in the area.
meanings.sent3: Eating spicy food exacerbates his heartburn.
meanings.sent4: Her absence exacerbates the loneliness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The lack of sleep exacerbates his irritability.
